name: Ringram's Curse
description:
Ringram's Curse is a platformer game with rhythm turn-based combat.  Play as Rwiyo, a young musician talented enough to clear the curse over this bucolic land. Defeat your enemies with the power of music, playing up to three instruments and take advantage of your enemies weakness.

Will you be able to end the Ringram's curse?

This is a university project developed by 5 students. All assets are original:

  • Marçal Tineo Estevez @marçal_tineo (Lead programmer, Game Design)
  • Raúl Rodriguez Coronil (Programming, Game Design)
  • Víctor Sabaté Moreno @SatTokifu (Programming, Game Design)
  • Andrea Raya Martínez @andrew_raaya (Lead Sound Composer & Producer,  Concept Artist, Cutscene Artist, Pixel Artist)
  • Anaïs Salla Anaya (Lead Pixel Artist)

Hope you enjoy it!
